name: DailyQuotes
0:
”Alexa, ask daily quotes to tell me a quote”
”Alexa, ask daily quotes for today's quote”
”Alexa, ask daily quotes for a new quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily quotes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Starting your day with an inspirational/motivational quote can have a lasting effect on your mood and how positive you become throughout the day. Daily Quotes is an amazing Alexa skill that enables you to listen to inspiring, motivational and humorous quotes from famous people. 

Just say: "Alexa, ask daily quotes to tell me a quote" and voila! Alexa will tell you about the Person and the famous words spoken by them. 

Try it now.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
